title: Billboard Font ID
content:
Would like to know the typeface used on this billboard

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [American Psycho Billboard.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120128095756/http:/typophile.com/files/American%20Psycho%20Billboard.jpg) | 377.23 KB |
author: GTG

comments.content:
Actually, I just found out - it's a quote from the movie.

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qoIvd3zzu4Y](http://web.archive.org/web/20120128095756/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=qoIvd3zzu4Y "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qoIvd3zzu4Y")

It's a brilliant billboard.

I knew about the film. But couldn't the screenwriter have done a little research, or is [Romalian](http://web.archive.org/web/20120128095756/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Romalian) really a term that I should know?
